general_advisory: In case of pest infestation in stored grain of rice, apply Three Aluminum Phosphide Tablet per one ton of rice; Cover it well with Tarpaulin and ensure no space is left. Mustard crop is in flowering to Pod formation stage, there is a chance of infestation of Mustard Sawfly, to control sawfly in mustard crop apply Profenofos+Cypermethrin. The time to sow Til crop has come, use varieties e.g Shubha, Smarak for good yield. Store the harvested paddy in a safer place to avoid rodent infestation.

advisory: There are chances of infection of Greengram crops by the yellow mosaic virus. To manage the population of the vector in the field first get rid of the severely infected plants by uprooting and destroying them far away from the field. Install 20 yellow sticky traps per acre. To manage whiteflies chemically spray Thiamethoxam @ 40 gram/acre or Acetamiprid @ 50-gram /acre or Pyriproxifen 10% EC @ 200-ml/acre by mixing in 200-litre of water.
To control tikka disease of Groundnut, apply Pyraclostobin 20% WG @ 1g/lit or Tebuconazole 25% WG @ 5g/10lit. Grow tolerant varieties like JAL-42, Devi.
